trans-unit.source: Represents a query that tests whether the action of a message is one of a specified set of actions.
trans-unit.target: 메시지 동작이 지정된 동작 집합 중 하나 인지를 테스트 하는 쿼리를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: It is invalid to construct an ActionMessageFilter with no actions.
trans-unit.target: 없는 동작이 포함 된 ActionMessageFilter를 생성 하는 것이 틀립니다.

trans-unit.source: This type is serializable as a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 이 형식은 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute> 직렬화 가능입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of this class with the set of actions for which it tests.
trans-unit.target: 테스트할 동작 집합으로이 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the array of `actions` provided to populate the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter> contains duplicate actions, the duplicates are removed and only one of them is added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter>.
trans-unit.target: 경우 배열을 `actions` 채울에 제공 되는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter>중복 동작이 있는 경우 중복 제거 되 고 둘 중 하나만 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter> 에 추가 됩니다</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of `actions` contained in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter> is accessed by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter.Actions%2A> property and cannot be modified after the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter> object is instantiated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>의 `actions` 에 포함 된는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter>액세스는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter.Actions%2A>속성 후 수정할 수 없습니다는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter>개체가 인스턴스화될.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter.Actions%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> that contains the set of actions for which the filter tests.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>를 필터에서 테스트할 동작 집합을 포함 하는.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: actions is .
trans-unit.target: actionsis .

trans-unit.source: The actions array is empty.
trans-unit.target: actions 배열이 비어 있는 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only copy of action strings for which this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter"></xref> tests.
trans-unit.target: 이 대 한 동작 문자열의 읽기 전용 복사본을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter"> </xref> 테스트 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The actions in the read-only collection returned cannot be modified after the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter> object is instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 후 반환 된 읽기 전용 컬렉션의 동작을 수정할 수 없습니다는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter>개체가 인스턴스화될.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> that contains the action strings for which this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter"></xref> tests.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> 이 대 한 동작 문자열을 포함 하는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter"> </xref> 테스트 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether a message's action matches one of the actions specified in this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 메시지의 동작이이에 지정 된 동작 중 하 나와 일치 하는지 여부를 테스트 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter.Match%2A> when a message must be tested against the actions in a single filter and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> is available.
trans-unit.target: 이 오버 로드를 사용 하 여 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter.Match%2A>단일 필터의 동작에 대해 메시지를 테스트 해야 합니다는 때와 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>´ ï ´.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter.Match%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> to test.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>테스트할</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> action header matches one of the specified actions; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>동작 헤더가 지정된 된 동작 중 하 나와 일치, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: message is .
trans-unit.target: messageis .

trans-unit.source: Tests whether a buffered message's action header matches one of the actions specified in this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 버퍼링된 된 메시지의 동작 헤더가이 지정 된 동작 중 하 나와 일치 하는지 여부를 테스트 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter.Match%2A> method when a message must be tested against the actions in a single filter and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> is available.
trans-unit.target: 이 오버 로드를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter.Match%2A>메서드는 메시지를 단일 필터의 동작에 대해 테스트 해야 하는 경우 및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>´ ï ´.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter.Match%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> to test.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>테스트할</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> action header matches one of the specified actions; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>동작 헤더가 지정된 된 동작 중 하 나와 일치, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>

trans-unit.source: messageBuffer is .
trans-unit.target: messageBufferis .
